21138.「……ふふふ。やっぱり 来たわね。\n 旅人のあなたなら 宿屋に立ち寄ると思って:
...Hmm. I knew you'd come. I figured you'd
stop by the Inn, being a traveler and all, so
I've been keeping you here!

21139.「あたしとの約束 覚えてるわよね？\n 前に ホッツィ親方の家で話していた\n:
You remember our agreement, don't you? Tell me
more about that monster you were talking about
at Boss Hotzi's house before.<yesno><close>

21140.「今の質問は 社交辞令みたいなものよ。\n あたしの頼みに 断るという選択肢はな:
The question was a social call. Refusing my
request is not an option. I wish you'd read my
mind.

21141.<pc>は ルナナに\n魔獣ビュブロスのことを 話した。:
<pc> told Lunana about Magical Beast
Byblos.

21142.「……なるほど。今 このアグラニは\n その魂を吸い取る 魔獣ビュブロスとかいう:
I see. So now this Agrani is being hunted by a
soul-sucking Magical Beast Byblos or something
like that.

21143.「そして その化け物を倒すために\n あの賢者ブロッゲンが 立ち上がったと……。:
And to defeat that monster, that sage Broggen
rose up... hmmm... just as I thought.

21144.「このチャンス 逃す手は ないわ！\n ブロッゲンよりも先に あたしが\n その:
I can't let this chance pass me by! I'll
defeat that hexenbiest before Broggen does and
become the hero!

21145.「<pc>と言ったかしら？\n いい情報を 教えてくれて ありがとう。\n お礼:
Did I say <pc>? Thanks for the tip. I
don't know if I can ever thank you enough.

21146.「あなたを あたしの下僕にしてあげるわ！\n 光栄に 思いなさい！:
I will make you my servant! You should be
honored!

21148.「ムチェ！ ブチャ！\n このドン亀！ なにチンタラやってんのよ！\n 賢者ブロ:
Mutch! Butch! You turtle! What are you doing?
Did you find out where Sage Broggen went?

21149.「ハア ハア……。はい……。\n ブロッゲンは 北のモガリム街道を 北東に抜け\:
Haa haa... yes... Broggen says he took the
Mogarim Highway north, then northeast into
Ezesol Canyon.

21150.「ふうん。なるほど。\n エゼソル峡谷の その場所をくまなく探せば\n 魔獣ビュ:
Hmmm. I see. So if we search all over that
place in Ezesol Canyon, we can find Magical
Beast Byblos.

21151.「それじゃ 新米下僕の <pc>。\n 賢者ブロッゲンの足取りを追って ヤツより:
Well then, my new servant, . You must follow the footsteps of the sage Broggen and defeat the hexenbiest before he does. Of
course, you'll do it, right?

21152.「いい返事ねっ！ その心構えがあれば\n あたしの筆頭下僕になれる日も 近いわよ:
That's a great answer! If you're ready for it,
you'll soon be my first servant! So go ahead
and work hard!

21153.「ムチェ！ ブチャ！\n あたしたちも 出発するわよ！\n さっさと 案内しなさ:
Mutch! Butch! We're leaving too! You'll show
us the way, quickly!

21154.「ハア ハア……。\n ったく 人使いが荒いぜ……。:
Ha ha ha... can't stand it... they're so rough
on you...

21155.「でもよ オレたち あの命令が\n やみつきに なっちまったんだよな……。\n:
But we got addicted to that order... you never
know what can happen in life.

21156.「バカッ！ そんなこと バラすんじゃねえ！\n 早く行こうぜ！ あの人を待たすと:
You idiot! Don't tell anyone about that! Let's
go, let's go, let's go! If we wait for him,
he'll slap us again!

21157.「お前も モタモタすんなよ。\n 新入りぃ！: Don't be too slow, you too. New guy!

21158.「なによっ！ あなたは やる気なのに\n 他のヤツの依頼が いっぱいで\n あた:
What? You're so motivated, but you can't take
my request because you're full of other
people's requests!

21159.「人にモノを頼んでいいのは あたしだけよ！\n たまった依頼を片付けて その辺り:
I'm the only one who can ask people to do things for me! You should finish your stack of requests and make sure they know what they're
talking about!

21160.「ふうん。あたしの頼みを 断るのね。\n いつもなら 断るなんて選択肢は\n 選:
Hmm. You're turning down my request, aren't
you? Normally, I wouldn't give you the option
of refusing, but...

21161.「あなたは 使えそうだから 慎重にいくわ。\n あたしの下僕になることのメリット:
You could be useful, so I'll be discreet. You'll have to think long and hard about the merits of being my servant before you come
back.

21162.「……ふふふ。やっぱり 来たわね。\n どう？ この間の件 考えなおしてくれた？:
...Hmm. I knew you'd come. How's it
going? Have you reconsidered the other day?

21163.「アグラニを狙う 魔獣ビュブロス……。\n そいつを 賢者ブロッゲンの足取りを追:
Magical Beast Byblos is after Agrani, and we're going to follow Sage Broggen's footsteps and defeat him before the bearded old man
does.

21164.「これを果たせば あたしは英雄……。\n あなたは その名誉ある下僕になれるって:
If I do this, I will be a hero and you will be
my honored servant. Why would I turn down such
a great offer?

21165.「先回りして来てるとは\n あなた なかなか 使えるじゃない。:
You're pretty handy, coming ahead of the
others.

21167.「なによっ！ ブロッゲンのヒゲオヤジが\n もう 魔獣と戦っちゃってるじゃない！:
What? Broggen's bearded father is already
fighting a hexenbiest!

21168.「ひとまず かくれて見てるわよ。\n スキあらば 手柄を横取りしてやるわッ！:
I'll hide and watch for now. I'll hide and
watch, and if I see a chance, I'll snatch the
credit!

21169.「……魔獣ビュブロス！\n 貴様の好きには させないのでアール！:
Magical Beast Byblos! I won't let you do what
you want!

21171.「なに あの杖…… 超使えるじゃない！\n ただの クチうるさい杖じゃなかったの:
What's with the cane... it's so useful! I
thought you said it was just a cane with a
mouth.

21172.「ブロッゲンさま 今なのでアーーール！！:
Dear Mr. Broggen, now so
Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!

21174.「……ひとまず 終わりましたね。\n ブロッゲンさま。: ...I think we're done for now. Mr. Broggen.

21176.「ブラボー！ 賢者ブロッゲンのおじさま！\n さすがね。ホレ直しちゃったわ。:
Bravo! Uncle Sage Broggen! You're a real piece
of work, aren't you? I'm so in love with you.

21177.「あっ！ あなたは ルナナ……！\n いったい どこから わいてでたのさ！？:
Ah! You are Lunana! Where in the world did you
come from?

21178.「どうでもいいでしょ そんなこと。\n それよりも どう？\n この魔獣 あたし:
It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter. What do
you think? How about we pretend that I'm the
one who defeated this hexenbiest?

21179.「どこを どうすれば\n そんな考えになるでアールか！？\n 今どきの若者は 恐:
How can you think like that?! The youth of
today are frightening!

21180.「うっさい！ 棒ッ！\n さっき ちょこっと見直したけど\n やっぱり ただの:
Stick! Stick! I looked it over a little
earlier, but it's just a piece of stick with a
loud mouth!

21181.「……ルナナよ。よく聞け。\n 魔獣ビュブロスとの 戦いは\n まだ 終わっては:
...Lunana. Listen carefully. The battle
against Magical Beast Byblos is not over
yet...

21183.「あらら ブロッゲンさま 寝ちゃったね。\n それじゃ ボクが 代わりに教えてあ:
Oh, Mr. Broggen, you fell asleep. Well then,
let me tell you something. I'll tell you how
that Hexenbiest and Mr. Broggen got together.

21184.「今から数年前 ブロッゲンさまは\n あのビュブロスの親…… レオン・ビュブロか:
A few years ago now, Lady Broggen once
defended Agrani from the parent of
Byblos...Leon Byblo.

21185.「レオン・ビュブロもまた 魂を吸い取る魔獣。\n そんな恐ろしい魔物を ブロッゲ:
Leon Byblo is also a soul-sucking hexabeast.
Broggen did everything in his power to defeat
this terrible monster, so let's go!

21186.「でもね……。レオン・ビュブロは\n 死に際に こう言ったんだ……。:
But you know... on his deathbed, Leon Byblo
said...

21187.「……我の魂を受け継いだ ３頭の子らが\n 貴様たちに 復讐を果たすであろう……:
Three of my children, who have inherited my
soul, will seek revenge against you.

21188.「そして今 復讐に現れた 子供のうち\n １頭を 倒したのでアール！\n 残るビ:
And now that I have defeated one of the
children who showed up for revenge! That
leaves two more Byblos to go!

21189.「そんなワケで 残りの２頭も ボクらが\n なんとかするから 余計なことしないで:
That's why we'll take care of the other two,
so don't do anything unnecessary. See you
later.

21190.「……ふふん。あたしって やっぱり\n 幸運の星のもとに 生まれたのね。:
I guess I was born under a lucky star after
all. I was born under a lucky star after all.

21191.「まだ チャンスは ２回もあるってことよ！\n なんとしてでも 残りの２頭を\n:
That means we still have two more chances! I
will do everything in my power to beat the
other two before Broggen does!

21193.「……ああ <pc>。\n あなたは クビよ。\n だって 依頼を こなせなかっ:
...Oh <pc>. You're fired. Because you
didn't do what we asked you to do.

21194.「また 何か頼むかもしれないけど\n 今回は 縁がなかったってことで。\n それ:
I may ask for something else, but I'll just
say I had no luck this time. See you later.

21195.「な…なあ 気にすんなよ。\n あの人はさ 誰に対しても\n ああいう人なんだ。:
Hey, don't worry about it. He's like that to
everyone.

21196.「お前は よくやったよ。\n ホラ これ 今回の報酬だ。: You did good. Here. This is your reward.

21197.「ムチェ！ 何してるの！？\n 早く 行くわよ！: Mutch! What are you doing? Come on, let's go!

21198.「それじゃな。\n あの人のワガママに 付き合ってくれて\n ありがとよっ！:
See you later. Thanks for going along with her
selfishness!

29388.「ハア… ハア……。\n ルナナさ～ん ただいま 戻りやした……。:
Haa... haa... Lunana~san, I'm back, I'm
back...

29389.「で そこから 北に行くと すぐに\n ふたつのつり橋に 挟まれた場所に出るんで:
And if you go north from there, you will soon come to a place between two suspension bridges, and he seems to be looking for
something there. He's looking for something there.

29390.「モガリム街道から 北東のエゼソル峡谷に入って\n すぐ北の ふたつのつり橋に:
If you look everywhere between the two suspension bridges just north of the Mogarim Highway and northeast into Ezesol Canyon, you
will find Byblos.
